      • removeUsagesBulk

        void removeUsagesBulk(java.util.Collection<? extends Usage> usages)
        Removes all specified usages from the usage view in one heroic swoop. Reloads the whole tree model once instead of firing individual remove event for each node. Useful for processing huge number of usages faster, e.g. during "find in path/replace all".

      • addExcludeListener

        default void addExcludeListener(Disposable disposable,
                                UsageView.ExcludeListener listener)
